name: Trinity College Dublin
overview: Ireland's highest-ranked university, known for its historic campus and global research reputation in humanities and sciences.
admission_requirements: High GPA/A-Level equivalent; IELTS 6.5; CAO for EU students.
financial_aid: TCD Global Excellence Scholarships; GOI-IES Government Scholarships.

name: University College Dublin
overview: A leading research-intensive university with Ireland's largest student population and triple-accredited business school.
admission_requirements: Minimum GPA 3.0; IELTS 6.5; Subject-specific A-Level/IB requirements.
financial_aid: UCD Global Graduate Scholarships; Ad Astra Excellence Awards.

name: ICD Business School
overview: A boutique business school specialized in professional Accounting, Finance, and Business qualifications validated by QQI.
admission_requirements: Secondary school completion; IELTS 6.0; Interview for some programs.
financial_aid: Institutional bursaries for international students based on merit.

name: American College Dublin
overview: Offers dual US and Irish accreditation, specializing in liberal arts, business, and performing arts.
admission_requirements: High school diploma; Personal statement; IELTS 6.0 minimum.
financial_aid: ACD Merit Scholarships based on high school GPA.

name: Griffith College
overview: Ireland's largest independent college with a strong focus on media, law, and professional computing degrees.
admission_requirements: IELTS 6.0; Recognized secondary school exit certificate; CV for PGT.
financial_aid: Griffith College Bursaries; International Student Merit Scholarships.

name: Dublin Business School
overview: Specializes in career-focused education in Business, Law, and Psychology in Dublin city center.
admission_requirements: IELTS 6.0 (UG) or 6.5 (PG); Standard secondary school completion.
financial_aid: Early bird payment discounts; Student progression scholarships.

name: Dundalk Institute of Technology
overview: A key regional hub providing industry-focused programs in engineering, health, and creative media.
admission_requirements: IELTS 6.0; Standard academic school leaving certificates.
financial_aid: DKIT International Student Scholarships for non-EU applicants.

name: National College of Art and Design
overview: Ireland's only dedicated art and design institution offering specialized studio-based degrees.
admission_requirements: Portfolio mandatory; IELTS 6.5; Strong academic background in arts.
financial_aid: Limited institution-specific art grants; NCAD Master’s bursaries.

name: University College Cork
overview: A world-class research university in Ireland's second city, known for medicine, science, and sustainability.

financial_aid: Quercus Entrance Scholarships; UCC International Merit Scholarships.

name: Dorset College
overview: Independent college focused on technical education and business skills tailored for the modern workforce.

financial_aid: Standard international student fee discounts for early enrollment.

name: University of Galway
overview: A top-tier research university on Ireland's west coast, world-renowned for MedTech, marine science, and a vibrant cultural campus.
admission_requirements: GPA 3.0+; IELTS 6.5 (min 6.0 in bands); Standard CAO for EU applicants.
financial_aid: Global Excellence Scholarships; Government of Ireland (GOI-IES) scholarships.

name: Munster Technological University
overview: A leading technological university specializing in industry-aligned degrees in engineering, business, and art across six campuses.

financial_aid: Non-EU Merit Scholarships (€2,500 - €3,000 reduction); Early payment discounts.

name: Atlantic Technological University Donegal
overview: Part of the ATU network, offering high-quality professional education in a scenic, low-cost region with strong industry links.

financial_aid: International Fee Scholarships for Non-EU students; Erasmus+ opportunities.

name: CCT College Dublin
overview: A specialized private college in the heart of Dublin focused on Computing, IT, and Business with a strong focus on employability.

financial_aid: Institutional merit-based bursaries; Group enrollment discounts.

name: University of Limerick
overview: Known for its expansive green campus and 'Co-operative Education' program, which includes mandatory work placements for most UG students.
